pages.text: Unfazed by their opponents strength, the crusaders are fierce warriors who fight on any command, fleeing is not an option. Using their long- or greatsword they are the main army of the templers, the most organised army known to mankind

pages.title: Class Focus
pages.text: The crusaders belong to the $(l:classes/slayer)slayer$() class. This is mostly because of their weapon usage.

pages.title: Weapon Focus
pages.text: The weapon focus of the crusaders is quite special, they have a choice. The crusaders either use a longsword or a greatsword. Because of their weapon variety, crusaders are really flexible in fights.

pages.title: The Long - and Greatsword
pages.text: When a long - or greatsword is used by a crusader, he gains +50% base damage. However there is one exception, any weapon with the enchantment 'Legendary Weapon: Longsword / Greatsword' also gains this boost, no matter the weapon.

pages.title: Unique Abilities
pages.text: The crusaders biggest ability is their choice in weapon. The longsword is a strong weapon which causes $(l:other/bleeding) bleeding I$() for (time) after (number) hits. The Greatsword is a big and heavy weapon which causes $(l:other/bleeding) bleeding II$() for (time) after (number) hits. Do note that this only happens when you achieve the $(l:other/attack_speed)attack speed$() condition.
